text:
<!everyone> hey folks! it's been a long time since we shared _*wins*_ :first_place_medal::tada::trophy:. is there something you'd like humble brag about? leave it in the thread. i'll kick it off. :slightly_smiling_face:
---
one quick thing before we get to jobs: <@U019F15SA7Q> led our <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/C014P2BJLER/p1638307322268100|recent pizza party>. and now she and i are working on an idea to bring more small group networking and breakout sessions to superpath. we'll have more details soon but i think you're really gonna like what we're working on! :sunglasses:
---
okay, jobs!
:tv: = includes a video Q&A
:zap:️ = new this week
---
:star:*️ featured full-time roles:*
---
• Verblio is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/229245-senior-manager-of-customer-experience-verblio|Senior Manager of Customer Experience> :zap:️ and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/219408-content-marketing-manager-verblio|Content Marketing Manager> :tv: (:wave: <@U02EL2NBYGL>)

• Kanopi Studios is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/225005-content-designer-kanopi-studios|Content Designer> 
• Avive is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/222645-content-and-communications-marketing-manager-avive|Content & Communications Marketing Manager> :tv: (:wave: <@U013BG9P1UN>)
• OpenPhone is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/222643-social-media-and-community-manager-openphone|Social Media & Community Manager> ️
• Mira Health is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/219888-content-strategist-mira-health|Content Strategist> ️
• Brief Media is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/216957-director-digital-content-and-audience-growth-brief-media|Director, Digital Content & Audience Growth>️
• Joonko Diversity is hiring a Senior Content Marketing Manager :tv: (:wave: <@UV5V2P0VB>)
• Appcues is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/218016-content-marketing-manager-appcues|Content Marketing Manager>
• Animalz is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/19186-content-marketing-manager-animalz|Content Marketing Manager> and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/211627-content-marketing-editor-animalz|Content Marketing Editor>
• Brief Media is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/216957-director-digital-content-and-audience-growth-brief-media|Director, Digital Content & Audience Growth>
• Omniscient Digital is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/213553-managing-editor-and-operations-lead-omniscient-digital|Managing Editor & Operations Lead> :tv: ️ (:wave: <@U0191E456RE> <@U01997SMK0F>)
• Very Good Marketing Agency is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/216211-content-strategist-very-good-marketing-agency|Content Strategist> ️
• Pinwheel is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/212267-content-marketing-specialist-pinwheel|Content Marketing Specialist>
• Panther is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/208592-director-of-content-marketing-panther|Director of Content Marketing> :tv:
• Pangea Money Transfer is hiring a Senior Content Marketing Manager
• Awesome Motive is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/188076-wordpress-content-writer-remote-awesome-motive-inc|WordPress Content Writer (Remote)>
---
:writing_hand: *freelance projects:*
• QuickBooks is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/223474-freelance-content-writer-quickbooks|Freelance Content Writer>

• Campfire Labs is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/196806-freelance-writer-remote-campfire-labs|Freelance Writer (Remote)> (:wave: <@U02C74ZGGG0>)
---
:female-technologist: *and more from the job board:*
---
• Homerun is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/228781-content-writer-homerun|Content Writer> :zap:
• Assembled is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/227937-content-marketing-lead-assembled|Content Marketing Lead> :zap:
• Stratabeat️ is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/226665-content-editor-stratabeat|Content Editor> :zap:

have a great weekend everyone!
:v: jimmy

text: A small win. Got a hot lead and sent a one-sheeter proposal within 30 mins! That use to take me all day or longer but leveraged my growing network, asked questions across Slack groups (like this one). And it was no sweat. 1% better every day :wink:

text:
After months of putting the pieces in place, my team started ramping up our production and publishing cadence. The win, however, is how our internal teams have rallied behind us and encouraged one another to amplify our content (e.g., leverage in sales calls, send to customers, and share on social media) *without being prompted*.

Anyone who’s been doing content for a while know that this type of support from internal teams typically requires begging and pleading.

text:
Started a new role as director of content marketing at Joonko and loving my content team of 2 in-house writers and 1 in-house social media manager.

We just finished a 3 day design thinking sesh to plan the editorial calendar and love the teams collaborative spirit.
